alert.note: Alert for Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 6:23PM CDT until September 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SEWARD AND SOUTHWESTERN MEADE COUNTIES... At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kismet, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kismet, Meade State Park, Hayne and Plains. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
